posts.post_content:
Posted By: mike mullins
Hello,

I have the following seven T206 doubles available for trade:


116. Davidson, Indianapolis -- 
poor (mouse nibbles at top, otherwise nice); Piedmont 350

133. Dooin, Phila. Nat'l -- 
fr-pr (pinholes in top corners, staining, glue residue on back); Pied. 150

152. Dygert, Phila. Amer. -- 
poor (multiple creases, paper loss on back); Piedmont 350

292. Manning, N.Y. Amer. (batting) -- 
fr-pr (creases, round corners); Sovereign 350

307. McGann, Milwaukee -- 
poor (trimmed on top, creased, writing on back); Sweet Cap 350

376. Perring, Cleveland -- 
vg (pretty nice card); Polar Bear

424. Seymour, N.Y. Nat'l -- 
poor (many creases); Sovereign 150


Fronts:
[IMG]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/5185/cardsfronteq6.jpg[/IMG]

Backs:
[IMG]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/4272/cardsbackom1.jpg[/IMG]

Please help me build my low-grade set!  Email me for my "haves" and for larger images (2.5MB each) of cards.

My trade rules:
-one for one (may consider other offers though)
-condition for condition (approx; I'm not too picky)
-you send, I receive, I send

Please respond here or email with questions/offers:

michaelamullins AT hotmail DOT com

Thank you!

Mike

Posted By: Bob
Hi,

I can use the Davidson if still available. I have for trade, Bell-hands over head-P with rubber band gouge, Donlin-with bat-trimmed at top-P, Livingstone-F-paper loss on back, Lobert-heavily creased-P, Stovall-creased-F

Please let me know if something makes sense.

Bob Bannon

Posted By: mike mullins
Davidson is spoken for.  Thanks!

mm

Posted By: mike mullins
The Perring and Manning are now spoken for as well.

Seymour, Dooin, McGann, and Dygert remain.  Please help!

Best,

mm

Posted By: mike mullins
The Seymour is now spoken for.  

Dooin, Dygert, and McGann are still available.  Please let me know if you have any cards to trade!

Best wishes,

mm


PS: Thanks to those who have already traded with me.  I have received three and sent three back out.  Trading is fun!

Posted By: Frank B

 I need a Dooin. 
E-mail me your list. Thanks.
